description:
Up until five minutes ago, it was unclear if Jasmine Crockett was too stupid to use a chair. However, she has since confirmed she does, as she provided words of wisdom to Tougaloo’s Class of 2025.

Rep. Jasmine Crockett gives advice to black students: "Use a chair" against haters pic.twitter.com/oZqA7SlwWg
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) May 5, 2025

The fact that she equates herself speaking at the graduation to a civil rights issue is deeply arrogant and out of touch with the real issues Americans face at hand. S
title: Jasmine Crockett inspires more hate, encourages students to "use a chair" against their haters

description:
According to Ilhan Omar, “Our country should be more fearful of white men because they are causing most of the deaths within this country.” However, given that not only is this false, but it’s disgustingly racist, JD Vance called her out for her disgraceful “genocidal language.”

In a resurfaced clip from 2018, Omar stated that the U.S. should fear white men more than other groups because they cause the most deaths. And to call that “genocidal language” would be an understatement.

This isn’t just sick; it’s actually genocidal language.

What a disgrace this person is. https://t.co/2PHdporJHM
— JD Vance (@JDVance) May 5, 2025
title: JD Vance blasts Ilhan Omar's “genocidal language” after her latest anti-white rant

description:
Even if one believes themselves to be a “classical liberal,” the left has gone so far off the deep end that the party no longer resonates with the average American. This is why people more often go from left to right than the other way around. And this is also why one former California sheriff has decided to leave “the party of paid protests, purple hair, and pronouns, and join the party of faith, family, and freedom.”

Former Los Angeles County Sheriff Alex Villanueva has officially registered as a Republican after identifying as a Democrat for decades.
title: Former CA Sheriff Leaves Democratic Party To Join The Party Of “faith, family, and freedom”

description:
If Trump was going to “destroy humanity,” why would he wait until his second term to do it? That is something actor Sean Penn can likely never answer, but that won’t stop him from making those foolish claims.

Penn went on Jim Acosta’s podcast to discuss why world leaders should not “cave” to the Trump Administration and claimed that voters need to ponder "worst-case scenarios" before electing the next president.

NEW: Actor Sean Penn says President Trump is like a "spouse-murd*rer," floats a "worst-case scenario" where Trump destroys the world.

This guy looks horrible.

The comment came as Penn was discussing with Jim Acosta and Eric Swalwell about what the rest of Trump's presidency… pic.twitter.com/Q2cOUhtnPR
title: Commie actor Sean Penn calls Trump a "spouse murderer," and then he gets ridiculous

description:
In 1972, the federal government purchased Alcatraz but shut it down after it became too expensive to run. However, according to Trump, it might become a prison again for “the dregs of society, who will never contribute anything other than Misery and Suffering.”

Today’s show breaks it down.

According to The Post Millennial

On Sunday, President Donald Trump called for Alcatraz, the n
title: Watch: Trump says he's gonna reopen Alcatraz, but can he?

description:
The most infamous American prison turned tourist trap might become a prison again. Winning. President Donald Trump wants criminal charges for people for participating in boycotts backed by International Government Organizations. We have all the details.. President Trump headed to Meet the Press where he slapped down Kristen Welker’s left wing media nonsense. Time for a Trump fact check.

TRUMP TO REPOPEN ALCATRAZ

  • "REBUILD, AND OPEN ALCATRAZ!"
title: Sources: Everything Wrong with Meet the Press' Trump Sandbag Interview

description:
If there's one thing you can say about the left, it's that they think you're stupid. The media thinks you're stupid when they attempt with a straight face to tell you they aren't biased towards Democrats. And both Democrats and the media (but I repeat myself) think you are stupid enough to believe they had no idea Joe Biden was a cognitively declining old coot until the debate with Donald Trump. Here we have an example of both. Democrat Gavin Newsom and media personality Jen Psaki.

Yes. The same Jen Psaki who went from the Obama Administration to CNN to the Biden Adminstration to MSNBC. Funny how that works, right?
title: Jen Psaki, Gavin Newsom take turns insulting the intelligence of Americans, swear they had no idea Biden was falling apart

description:
The Mexican Cartels have been labeled a terrorist group by the Trump Administration. And if you were wondering how that makes the cartels feel, CNN has your back. They traveled to Mexico to interview a cartel leader about how it feels knowing Donald Trump called them a terrorist. Quick side note: At the White House Correspondents Dinner last month, journalismers swore they were not the enemy of the people.

Look, I get that Democrats and the media (but I repeat myself) are upset Trump's common-sense illegal immigration reforms have shut down the border and, as a result, shut down Democrat voter registration initiatives. I also get that all content create
title: To bash Donald Trump, CNN interviewed a Mexican Cartel member about being labeled a terrorist. No, really.
